Extract raw values from choices

extract_raw_choices.Rd

Extract raw values from choices

extract_raw_choices(choices, sep)

Arguments

choices

(choices_labeled or list or character) with choices
sep

(character) A separator string to split the choices or selected inputs into the values of the different columns

Value

choices simplified

Contents

Developed by NEST, Adrian Waddell, Pawel Rucki, Dawid Kaledkowski, Sebastian Wolf, Maximilian Mordig, Bartosz Baranowski, Ondrej Slama, Nikolas Burkoff, Maciej Nasinski, Roche.
